panels.description: Shows total message size for selected pins about the selected range
panels.title: > Total messages size in bytes

panels.description: Shows total message size per box pin for selected pins about the selected range
panels.title: > Total message size per box pin in bytes

targets.expr:
sum(rate(th2_rabbitmq_message_size_publish_bytes{namespace="${namespace}", job="${component}", th2_pin=~"${th2_pin}", th2_type="MESSAGE_GROUP"}[1m])) by (th2_pin)
/
sum(rate(th2_message_group_publish_total{namespace="${namespace}", job="${component}", th2_pin=~"${th2_pin}"}[1m])) by (th2_pin)

panels.title: > Size of th2 group in bytes/sec

targets.expr:
sum(rate(th2_rabbitmq_message_size_subscribe_bytes{namespace="${namespace}", job="${component}", th2_pin=~"${th2_pin}", th2_type="MESSAGE_GROUP"}[1m])) by (th2_pin)
/
sum(rate(th2_message_group_subscribe_total{namespace="${namespace}", job="${component}", th2_pin=~"${th2_pin}"}[1m])) by (th2_pin)

targets.expr:
sum(increase(th2_rabbitmq_message_size_publish_bytes{namespace="${namespace}", job="${component}", th2_type="MESSAGE_GROUP", th2_pin=~"${th2_pin}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (th2_pin)
/
sum(increase(th2_rabbitmq_message_publish_total{namespace="${namespace}", job="${component}", th2_type="MESSAGE_GROUP", th2_pin=~"${th2_pin}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (th2_pin)

(sum(increase(th2_message_publish_total{namespace="${namespace}", job="${component}", th2_pin=~"${th2_pin}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (th2_pin)

panels.description: Shows total event quantity for selected pins about the selected range
panels.title: > Total events quantity

panels.description: This panel shows the ratio of outgoing events to outgoing event batches by th2_pin (actual version). For the old version panel shows it without grouping by th2_pin.

targets.expr:
sum(increase(th2_event_publish_total{namespace="${namespace}", job="${component}", th2_pin=~"${th2_pin}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (th2_pin)
/
sum(increase(th2_rabbitmq_message_publish_total{namespace="${namespace}", job="${component}", th2_pin=~"${th2_pin}", th2_type="EVENT"}[$__rate_interval])) by (th2_pin)

panels.title: > Event batch size

panels.description: This panel shows the ratio of outgoing events to outgoing event batches by th2_pin (actual version). For the old version panel shows it without grouping by th2_pin.

panels.title: < Total events quantity

panels.description: This panel shows the ratio of outgoing events to outgoing event batches by th2_pin (actual version). For the old version panel shows it without grouping by th2_pin.

targets.expr:
sum(increase(th2_event_subscribe_total{namespace="${namespace}", job="${component}", th2_pin=~"${th2_pin}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (th2_pin)
/
sum(increase(th2_rabbitmq_message_process_duration_seconds_count{namespace="${namespace}", job="${component}", th2_pin=~"${th2_pin}", th2_type="EVENT"}[$__rate_interval])) by (th2_pin)

panels.title: < Event batch size

panels.description: This panel shows the ratio of outgoing events to outgoing event batches by th2_pin (actual version). For the old version panel shows it without grouping by th2_pin.
panels.title: < Event batch rate

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(th2_rabbitmq_message_process_duration_seconds_bucket{namespace="$namespace", job="$component", th2_type="EVENT", th2_pin=~"${th2_pin}"}[5m])) by (le, th2_pin))

sum(increase(th2_rabbitmq_message_process_duration_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", job="$component", th2_type="EVENT", th2_pin=~"${th2_pin}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (th2_pin)
/
sum(increase(th2_rabbitmq_message_process_duration_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", job="$component", th2_type="EVENT", th2_pin=~"${th2_pin}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (th2_pin)

panels.description: This panel shows the ratio of incoming groups to incoming group batches by th2_pin (actual version). For the old version panel shows it without grouping by th2_pin.

sum(increase(th2_message_group_subscribe_total{namespace="${namespace}", job="${component}", th2_pin=~"${th2_pin}"}[5m])) by (th2_pin)
/

/
sum(rate(th2_message_group_subscribe_total{namespace="${namespace}", job="${component}", th2_pin=~"${th2_pin}"}[1m])) by (th2_pin)
/
sum(rate(th2_rabbitmq_message_process_duration_seconds_count{namespace="${namespace}", job="${component}", th2_pin=~"${th2_pin}", th2_type="MESSAGE_GROUP"}[1m])) by (th2_pin)

/

sum(rate(th2_event_subscribe_total{namespace="${namespace}", job="${component}"}[1m])) by (th2_pin)
/
